Julie Cnossen
Arbor Circle Corporation
1115 Ball NE
Grand Rapids, MI 49505
RE: License #: CB410201176
Arbor Circle - Homeless Youth Services
1115 Ball Avenue, NE
Grand Rapids, MI 49505-5904
Dear Mrs. Cnossen:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
July 14, 2020. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (616)552-3662.
Sincerely,
Holly Austin, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 200
121 Franklin Street SE
Grand Rapids, MI 49507
(269) 330-7082
enclosure
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
No technical assistance was requested or required.
V. CONSULTATION
No consultation was requested or required.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The agency has submitted no acceptable corrective action plans not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
A review of the electronic records of the youth who were under the age of 18 when
admitted to the program were reviewed. The records were found to be in compliance
with required rules.
The two program therapists were interviewed separately and both reported having
low caseloads currently. They reported that they have received a lot of support and
direction from their direct supervisor as well as upper management throughout the
past year and neither reported any concerns.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules.
July 14, 2020
________________________________________
Holly K. Austin Date
Licensing Consultant
